{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Universal ProTaper retreatment system is a set of files used in endodontics to remove root canal filling material. The system consists of three files: D1, D2, and D3. The D1 file has a non-cutting tip, while the D2 and D3 files have cutting tips. However, the end cutting tip is specifically seen in the D3 file.", "answer_choice": "C. D-3"}
